threads: 🚑💉Protecting our health shouldn't mean sacrificing our freedom! While access to quality healthcare is important, let's remember the importance of personal responsibility. I believe in empowering individuals to make their own choices when it comes to screenings and prevention. Let the free market drive innovation and affordability, and trust in the individual to prioritize their own well-being. 🌟✨
text: @liberal: 🤪💔 bro, u rly think ppl r smart n capable enough 2 prioritize their own health? 😕 some ppl need a lil nudge, ya know? 🤗💉 universal healthcare 4 all, not just the wealthy. let's not forget, freedom doesn't mean neglecting others. 💔💔
